channel.title: You play anything like this?
channel.description:
I was just wondering if any of you play any types of roms or anything.
Im currently Playing MegaMan Battle Network 6 and I have been looking to play people online. I set up the server today
Do any of you play roms?

item.title: You play anything like this?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“G-Maker, post:11, topic:353913”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=450210.msg3302650#msg3302650 date=1281413627]
I used to play all types of ROMS off emulators when I was bored at the school computer lab.
[/quote]Nice got a favorite game?[/quote]

Chrono Trigger

Tis fucking amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: You play anything like this?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“G-Maker, post:13, topic:353913”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=450210.msg3302724#msg3302724 date=1281420615]
You should setup something on how to use VBALink as the tuts never seem to work for me. Or is it only certain games?
[/quote]Its only certain games. And also only some work using the wifi feature. I do have a tut on my site. Oh btw I like your site too. I like the banner how its simple yet captivating[/quote]DO NOT LEECH MY COLLECTION OF 1.1K ROMS ON DAT SITE DOOD, IT TOOK 2 HOURS TO UPLOAD TO SHITTY MEDIAFIRE.

Apart from that I play: Genesis, Master system I/II, GBC/GBA and many others, but I prefer playing them on the original consoles at my uncles house.

Read full topic

item.title: You play anything like this?
item.dc:creator: @G-Maker G-Maker
item.description:
@G-Maker wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:8, topic:353913”][quote author=G-Maker link=topic=450210.msg3302542#msg3302542 date=1281406541]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=450210.msg3302540#msg3302540 date=1281406382]
oh god lol. Anyways, I may try it, but I’ll need a decent save first. I haven’t touched any GBA ROMS in a really long time and I know I don’t have any good save states
[/quote]In order to play online you need the VBALink you can get it here : http://www.zetagames.tk
[/quote]Ah, thanks Any idea where to find a good save state though? :|[/quote]All I found were games that you have to start from the beginning. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: You play anything like this?
item.dc:creator: @G-Maker G-Maker
item.description:
@G-Maker wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:2, topic:353913”]Everyone that knows me should know that I don’t like low graphical games (mostly why I stick to consoles) I’ve been a gamer for years but know shit about the 8bits.[/quote]I worry about graphics as well, but gameplay is a big factor for me also. I found that MegaMan Battle Network 6 has decent graphics but has Great gameplay. So to me it evens out.
